attributes.action: Bring back the BCG vaccination for all British school children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This year the goverment have decided against the rountine vaccination to protect against the fatal TB virus, as they claim that the disease is no longer a major health hazzard, even though each year more and more people in Britain are being diagnosed with the virus.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
